snippet.title: Mosaic Chronicles | Launch Trailer (Steam)
snippet.description:
Listen carefully, my friend – and I shall tell you the story of courage, love, luck ... and the importance of reading skills! Move and rotate pieces of stained glass to complete mosaics and uncover the story in Mosaic Chronicles, a story-driven puzzle game.

Check out Mosaic Chronicles on Steam Early Access:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1034150/Mosaic_Chronicles/

Follow Us on Social Media:
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Mosaic-Chronicles-103494898682156
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/MosaicChronicl1
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mosaicchroniclesgame/
